attr_Origin_Country: Country where the rice was grown and harvested.
attr_Grain_Length: Describes the length of the rice grain.
attr_Broken_Percentage: Percentage of broken kernels in the rice.
attr_Processing_Method: Method used to prepare the rice for consumption.
attr_Rice_Variety: Specific cultivar or type of rice.
attr_Packaging_Type: Type of container used to package the rice.
attr_Rice_Brand: Brand name of the rice product.
attr_Fortification_Status: Indicates whether the rice has been fortified with additional nutrients.
attr_Rice_Quality: Grading or quality level of the basmati rice.
attr_Cleaning_Method: Method used to clean the basmati rice.
attr_Organic_Status: Indicates whether the basmati rice is organically grown.
attr_Aging: Indicates whether the basmati rice has been aged.
attr_Brand: The brand name under which the rice is sold.
attr_Processing_State: The state of the rice after processing.
attr_Organic_Certification: Indicates if the rice is certified organic.
attr_Crop_Year: The year in which the rice was harvested.
attr_Purity_Percentage: Percentage of the rice that is of the stated variety.
attr_Grain_Size: Categorization of rice based on its length-to-width ratio.
attr_Intended_Use: The purpose or dish for which the rice is best suited.
attr_Milling_Grade: Quality grade of the milled rice.
